root: ^GP: Hi there, how do you do?
^Fabian: Oh hello. My name is Fabian and I'm the new witch in town. What's your name?
^GP: the name's Grizzly Paw, or GP for short. I come out here to play every now and then.
^Fabian: I wasn't expecting anyone to be playing any instruments here in the forest.
^Fabian: Don't you want to play in a place where more people can hear you?
^GP: I used to play on the other side of the river, at the old tavern. It sure would be nice to play there again.
^Fabian: Why don't you play there anymore then?
^GP: Well, ya see when I was a youngin there used to be a bar where bears of all sorts would gather. There were some beavers too.
^GP: That's where I first started out ya'know. But nowdays the bar is...
^GP: well, the atmosphere isn't what it used to be.
^GP: Something happend. It was a long time ago, but the distance between Bears and Beavers have only grown.
^GP: Now there are two taverns instead of one.
^GP: Also, some time ago the bridge over the river south of here broke down in a strom. Noone wants to take responsibility for it and do the repairs. Somethin' about it being the others fault.
^GP: One of these days I'll go into town and get me a hammer. Repair the birdge myself.
^GP: Anyway, feel free to come by again.
